DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Transcend Auto effective treat obstructive sleep apnea another device already market .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , crossover trial . Patients randomize 1:1 undergo two full night sleep study Transcend Auto commercially available device .
DOC.criteria: Adult 18 year age old Diagnosis obstructive sleep apnea Presently use CPAP APAP therapy Central mixed apnea
